mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_withdrawreq (withdrawreqid, transorderid, merchantcode, userid, productid, userorderid, orderdate, amount, userfee, status, creator, createtime, standardrate, executionrate, ratetype, receivablefee, receivedfee,bankname,bankcode) values (#{withdrawreqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transorderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderdate}, #{amount}, #{userfee}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime}, #{standardrate}, #{executionrate}, #{ratetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receivablefee}, #{receivedfee},#{bankname},#{bankcode})
mapper.update:
update t_tfs_withdrawreq
transorderid = #{transorderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchantcode = #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productid = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userorderid = #{userorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderdate = #{orderdate},
amount = #{amount},
userfee = #{userfee},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime},
standardrate = #{standardrate},
executionrate = #{executionrate},
ratetype = #{ratetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receivablefee = #{receivablefee},
receivedfee = #{receivedfee},
where withdrawreqid = #{withdrawreqid}
